mean_cn: n. 地质学，（某一地区的）地质
mean_en: a science that studies rocks, layers of soil, etc., in order to learn about the history of the Earth and its life
word_etyma: geo土地 + logist名词后缀：...学家 → geologist 地质学家
short_phrase: Geology is the study of Earth.
sentence: Geology is the study of the planet Earth.
sentence_trans: 地质学是研究地球的学科。
